com.brightcove.ssai.ad

Class AdPod

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.ssai.ad.AdPod

  • public class AdPod
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of an Ad pod. An Ad pod is a sequenced group of Ads.

    • Method Summary
